name: PROSTATE_NEEDLE_BI
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76042-PROSTATE GLAND: Needle Biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: PERINEURAL_INVASN_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Perineural Invasion.
entries: Present in vessels of parenchyma outside of tumor nodules

columns.name: SEMINAL_VESICLE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Seminal Vesicle Invasion.

columns.name: PERIPROSTATIC_FAT_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Periprostatic Fat Invasion.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: HISTOLOGIC_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade.
entries: Favorable (purely epithelial, fetal subtype, mitotically inactive with <=2 mitoses in
Less favorable (all subtypes other than those designated "Favorable" or "Unfavorable"
Unfavorable (small cell undifferentiated or rhabdoid as the predominant or sole histo

columns.name: PRIMARY_GLEASON_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Primary Gleason Pattern.

columns.name: SECONDARY_GLEASON_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Secondary Gleason Pattern.

columns.name: TOTAL_GLEASON_SCORE
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Gleason Score.

columns.name: POSITIVE_CORE_NUM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Number of Cores Positive.

columns.name: TOTAL_CORES_NUM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Number of Cores.

columns.name: PROSTATIC_TISSUE_PR
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Proportion (%) of prostatic tissue involved by tumor.

columns.name: TUMOR_QUANTITATION
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Quantitation Millimeters Specify.

columns.name: CARCINOMA_LINEAR
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Linear Millimeters of Carcinoma.

columns.name: NEEDLE_CORE_LINEAR
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Linear Millimeters of Needle Core Tissue.

columns.name: PROS_TISSUE_PR_GRT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Proportion (%) of Prostatic Tissue Involved by Tumor for Core with the Greatest Amount of Tumor.

columns.name: PATH_INFLAM_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Additional Pathological Findings - Specify Inflammation.
